trans-unit.source: Represents the location of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> instance specified with a unique network address configuration by describing the current instance of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"></xref> within the Peer-to-Peer Collaboration Infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la posizione di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref>, o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> istanza specificata con una configurazione di indirizzo di rete univoco per la descrizione dell'istanza corrente di un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe"> </xref> all'interno dell'infrastruttura di collaborazione Peer-to-Peer.

trans-unit.source: A peer "endpoint" describes a contact's presence location — the unique network address configuration that describes the currently available instance of the contact within the peer collaboration network.
trans-unit.target: Un peer "endpoint" descrive il percorso di presenza di un contatto, ovvero la configurazione di indirizzo di rete univoco che descrive l'istanza del contatto all'interno della rete di collaborazione peer attualmente disponibile.

trans-unit.source: A single contact can be available at multiple endpoints within the peer collaboration network.
trans-unit.target: Un singolo contatto può essere disponibile più endpoint all'interno della rete di collaborazione peer.

trans-unit.source: A peer watching a contact can query any of the endpoints associated with that contact for specific peer presence, application, or object updates.
trans-unit.target: Un peer che controlla un contatto può eseguire query a uno o più endpoint associati al contatto per la presenza di peer specifica, applicazioni o aggiornamenti di oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Generates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Genera una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> class with the peer-associated endpoint contained in <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> classe con l'endpoint associato al peer contenuto in <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint associato al peer.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the peer-associated endpoint contained in and a string specifying endPointName.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe con l'endpoint associato al peer contenuto in e una stringa che specifica endPointName .

trans-unit.source: The endpoint associated with the peer.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint associato al peer.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il nome associato la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The endPoint argument specifies .
trans-unit.target: Il endPoint argomento specifica .

trans-unit.source: The endPoint specified is not a valid IPv6 endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Il endPoint specificato non è un endpoint IPv6 valido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza con i parametri associati necessari per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione della serializzazione associata il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto ed eventualmente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Impostare su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> that contains the IP address associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>che contiene l'indirizzo IP associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: To avoid corrupting the instance state, the caller should not change the EndPoint value if the instance was obtained from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare di danneggiare lo stato dell'istanza, il chiamante non deve modificare il valore dell'EndPoint se l'istanza è stata ottenuta <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: IP address associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Indirizzo IP associato il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The specified EndPoint endpoint is not a valid IPv6 endpoint.
trans-unit.target: L'endpoint dell'EndPoint specificato non è un endpoint IPv6 valido.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Confronta la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> specificata <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza per verificare l'uguaglianza.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> fornita contiene dati corrispondenti <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Questo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Confronta la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> al <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> specificato

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Object>per verificare l'uguaglianza.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> is equal to the specified object instance, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se la <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> è uguale all'istanza dell'oggetto specificato <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> objects are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetti sono considerati uguali.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instances provided have matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanze fornite sono dati corrispondenti <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il codice hash per un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash intero utilizzato per confrontare istanze di questo tipo con segno a 32 bit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class instance with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> istanza della classe con i dati necessari per serializzare l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Un tipo derivato deve chiamare il tipo di base <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>metodo.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.String> that represents a displayed name for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un <xref:System.String>che rappresenta un nome visualizzato per il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To avoid corrupting the instance state, the caller should not change the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A> value if the instance was obtained from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Per evitare di danneggiare lo stato dell'istanza, il chiamante non deve modificare il <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A>valore se l'istanza è stata ottenuta <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.EndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> representing the display name of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il nome visualizzato del <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Signaled when the name associated with a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object changes.
trans-unit.target: Segnalato quando il nome è associato un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> modifiche dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.

trans-unit.source: Called when a change occurs to the PeerName specified by the associated with the instance.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene apportata una modifica per il PeerName specificato dal associato il istanza.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the `PeerName`.
trans-unit.target: Specifica il tipo di modifica che si è verificato per il `PeerName`.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific SynchronizingObject.
trans-unit.target: Quando il valore della proprietà è impostato, tutti gli eventi non viene generati come risultato di un'operazione asincrona avrà i gestori eventi richiamati sul thread che ha creato il SynchronizingObject specifico.

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: Il valore del set predefinito di questa proprietà è `null`, che indica che tutti i gestori eventi vengono chiamati in un thread di pool di thread di sistema.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Impostare questa proprietà viene in genere un elemento dell'interfaccia utente, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>istanza.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che implementa il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> l'interfaccia e viene utilizzato dalle istanze di questo tipo per la sincronizzazione dei gestori di eventi sul thread che li ha creati.

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: È stato eliminato l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: Populates the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
trans-unit.target: Popola corrente <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza con i dati ottenuti dall'origine serializzata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: La destinazione per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> that represents a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.String>che rappresenta un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> istanza.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> representing a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>che rappresenta un <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> oggetto è stato eliminato.
